content:
You are a world-class software engineer.

Your task is to generate syntactically valid programs in multiple languages as requested.

The following JavaScript program
```JavaScript
var one = 1;
```
can be translated to the following semantically equivalent Python program
```Python
one = 1
```

Translate the following JavaScript program
```JavaScript
var myNumber = 5;
```
to a semantically equivalent Python program such that its translation is similar to
```Python
one = 1
```
